title: Dice Commands
description: Remembering all the dice commands can be hard, so I'm here to help!

fields.name: +dice 1d4 + 5
fields.value: roll a four-sided dice and add five. you can also minus (-) or multiply (*)

fields.name: +dice 2d6 + 1d8
fields.value: roll two six-sided dice and then an eight-sided dice

fields.name: +dice 3d8 d1
fields.value: roll three eight-sided dice and drop the lowest result

fields.name: +dice 4d6 k1
fields.value: roll four six-sided dice and keep the highest result

fields.name: +dice 2d8 kl1
fields.value: roll two eight-sided dice and keep the lowest result

fields.name: +dice 2d8 ! Purrrr
fields.value: roll two eight-sided dice add a comment on why you did it

fields.name: +dice help
fields.value: get information on how to use the dice roll command
